members.member: DELETE THIS ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ KEEP THIS vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv Record axis coding of cause of death

member.name: P:VRDR.CodingResponseMessage.CauseOfDeathEntityAxis
member.summary: Flat list of entity axis (line, position, codes)

member.name: T:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry
member.summary: Class for structuring a cause of death entity axis entry

members.member:
Identifies the line number (values "1" to "6") of the corresponding cause of death entered on the death certificate. The following list shows the corresponding line in the death certificate for each value.
Part I. Line a
Part I. Line b
Part I. Line c
Part I. Line d
Part I. Line e
Part II
There can be up to 20 total entries, with up to 5 entries per line. A line number from the death certificate.

member.name: F:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry.Position
member.summary: The position of the code within the line.

member.name: F:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry.Code
member.summary: The code assigned for one of the cause of death entries in the death certificate.

member.name: F:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry.E_code_indicator
member.summary: A holdover from ICD-9 days. Normally absent. When present should be an ampersand.

member.name: M:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry with the specified line identifier
